nodes.bodyText: @calvinjia Based on the estimate of 1KB memory consumption per file, do you think we should update the capacity estimate here with a more realistic number?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -56,7 +56,7 @@ These tuning parameters primarily affect the behavior of the cache.
 
 The heap metastore is simple: it stores all metadata on the heap. This gives consistent,
 fast performance, but the required memory scales with the number of files in the
-filesystem. With 32GB of Alluxio master memory, Alluxio can support around 40 million files.
+filesystem. With 32GB of Alluxio master memory, Alluxio can support around 30 million files.

nodes.bodyText: Yeah I think we can give the guidance of 2 GB = 1 million files and say 64 GB supports about 30 million files.
